title: Self-Efficacy and Self-Directed Learning Competency Enhancement Through Virtual Game Simulation in Psychiatric Nursing

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Conducted in a mobile-based microlearning environment for current practitioners, with digital devices provided

learning_goals: Learners can apply therapeutic communication skills with 80% accuracy in psychiatric patient simulation scenarios.
Learners can classify mental health status into a three-tier structure by analyzing patient data collected via VGS.
Learners improve self-directed learning skills by 30% by writing reflective journals after simulation experiences.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
